title: The Buddhist world
brief_description: Reviews the origins of Buddhism through the life, work, and philosophy of Gautama Buddha; gives an understanding of the major doctrines of Buddhist belief; traces the historical and cultural growth of Buddhism, and shows its influence in those lands where it is practiced today - India, Thailand, Japan and Tibet.
